scripts.coverage: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root ./src --report text --report html --report lcov node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --require config/setup.js --recursive test
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf build && mkdir build && d2-manifest package.json manifest.webapp
scripts.postbuild: cp -r index.html icon.png auth.png node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js manifest.webapp i18n build/
scripts.test: echo Everything is probably ok! # mocha --reporter spec --compilers js:babel-core/register --require config/setup.js --recursive test
scripts.test-watch: echo Everything is always ok! # mocha --reporter spec --compilers js:babel-core/register --require config/setup.js --recursive test --watch
